content: this legal document explains the progress of a divorce case between mr x and his former wife they had previously divided their assets through a mutual consent divorce as part of this division a specific property was allocated to mr x the property originally belonged to mrs x but was transferred to both partners in 2006 following the courts dissolution of their marriage the property now belongs definitively to mr x subject to the conditions stated in the previous agreement the value of the property is determined to be 315'000â‚¬ in this document mr x and mrs x have reached an agreement regarding a debt owed by mr x to mrs x which amounts to 110'341.35â‚¬ they have agreed on terms such as mr x taking responsibility for the mortgage loan and dividing joint property mrs x has received the full amount owed to her and both parties consider the matter settled the document also mentions the dismissal of certain registration obligations and provides information about tax statements and the identity of the parties involved the parties acknowledge their obligations and rights under the law including the option to appoint another notary and have legal counsel present if there are conflicting interests they have received a draft of the document before its execution and have signed it in the presence of the notary
